name: DCATaccessRights
displayName: This property contains information indicating whether the dataset is publicly accessible, has access restrictions, or is not accessible.

name: DCATidentifier
displayName: Identifier is used for the unique identification of the data.

name: DCATkeyword
displayName: This property contains commonly used words or formalised phrases to describe a dataset that do not come from a controlled vocabulary.

name: DCATpublisher
displayName: The organisation responsible for publishing the dataset.

name: DCATapplicableLegislation
displayName: This property contains the HvD legislation that mandates the creation or management of the dataset.

name: DCAThvdCompliant
displayName: Indicates wheter or not the dataset is subject to the High-Value Datasets Implementation Regulation.

name: DCAThvdApplicableLegislation
displayName: This property contains the HvD legislation that mandates the creation or management of the dataset.

name: DCAThvdCategory
displayName: This property contains the HVD category to which this dataset belongs, if the dataset falls under the High-Value Datasets Implementing Regulation.

name: DCATrights
displayName: A statement specifying the rights associated with distribution. This shall only include the remaining rights that are not covered by the licence or access rights.
